FuncDef: This command configures the allowable pseudowire capability list that is advertised to the far end. An empty list results in both pseudowire capabilities being advertised.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the Ethernet pseudo-wire type is advertised.
Specifies that the Ethernet-VLAN pseudo-wire type is advertised. This parameter is only supported in SR OS Release 14.0 R4 or later.
